exploreSections: Explore the different sections of our application using the buttons below.
instructionsMessage: This is the customer list page. You can add, view, update, and delete customers!
allFieldsRequired: All fields are required and must have valid values.
confirmUpdateContent: Are you sure you want to update this flight?
confirmDeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this flight?
flightInstructions:
1. To add a flight, enter all flight details in the input fields and then click the "Add Flight" button to save the flight.

2. To view the flight list, the list of flights will display below the input fields. Tap on a flight to view its details.

3. To update a flight, tap on a flight in the list to load its details, modify the details in the input fields, and click the Update button to save changes.

4. To delete a flight, tap on a flight in the list to view its details, click the Delete button, and confirm the deletion in the AlertDialog.
saveDataDialogMessage: Do you want to save data on this page?
confirmDeleteMessage: Do you want to delete this reservation?
instructionsContent:
1. To add an airplane, enter all airplane details in the input fields and then click the "Add Airplane" button to save the airplane.

2. To view the airplane list, the list of airplanes will display below the input fields. Tap on an airplane to view its details.

3. To update an airplane, tap on an airplane in the list to load its details, modify the details in the input fields, and click the "Update" button to save changes.

4. To delete an airplane, tap on an airplane in the list to view its details, click the "Delete" button, and confirm the deletion in the AlertDialog.
